original_text: Agree with thine adversary quickly, whiles thou art in the way with him; lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge, and the judge deliver thee to the officer, and thou be cast into prison.
korean_text: 너를 고발하는 자와 함께 길에 있을 때에 급히 사화하라 그 고발하는 자가 너를 재판관에게 내어 주고 재판관이 옥리에게 내어 주어 옥에 가둘까 염려하라

sentences.original_text: whiles thou art in the way with him
lest at any time the adversary deliver thee to the judge
sentences.korean_translation: 혹시 대적이 너를 재판관에게 넘겨줄까 하노라

sentences.original_text: and the judge deliver thee to the officer
and thou be cast into prison
